name: 無機化學（二）
description: To train students to have the basic concepts of CFT and complexes.
goals: The hydrogen atomic structure and the trend of the periodical elements.
Main group elements and their compounds.
syllabus:
Organometallic Chemistry

*   Introduction to coordination compounds  
    
*   d-metal complexes : electronic structure and properties  
    
*   Coordination chemistry : reactions of complexes  
    
*   d-metal organometallic chemistry 

Applications

*   Materials chemistry and nanomaterials  
    
*   Castalysis  
    
*   Biological inorganic chemistry  
    
*   Inorganic chemistry in medicine
